section.title: cnt.get
section.para: get counter value (takes group and counter name as parameters)

section.title: cnt.reset
section.para: reset counter (takes group and counter name as parameters)

section.title: cnt.grps_list
section.para: list all the counter group names

section.title: cnt.var_list
section.para: list all the counters names in a specified group

section.title: cnt.grp_get_all
section.para: list all counter names and values in a specified group

section.title: cnt.help
section.para: print the description of a counter (group and counter name required).
